p: Following an exposure to A. aspera extract, the level of ALP was decreased (126U/L) compared to the control (148U/L). Similarly, ALT levels increased significantly(p < 0.05) in the administration of R. abyssinicus extract (71U/L) compared to the control (63.65U/L). However, all tested extracts did not show effect on AST levels ( Fig. 5 A-C).
